Hints.part1: Remember that division is the opposite of multiplication.
Hints.part2: What number times the smaller number equals the bigger number?

Hints.part1: Try to recall your multiplication facts.
Hints.part2: The smaller number times what other number gives you the bigger one?

ThinkAloudPrompts.part1: Try thinking out loud about the first thing you need to do in this problem.
What is the first step to solving this problem? Try saying it out loud.
